TPE331-10 Conversion Program Get the most out of your engine's performance when you upgrade your Honeywell TPE331-5 to the TPE331-10 with TAE Aviation. Take advantage of an affordable and reliable solution designed to save you time and money without the stress of replacing your entire engine. With several options to increase your engine's performance, the TPE331-10 conversion program is the most cost-effective solution to keep your Dornier 228 flying for many years to come.
Before Conversion
After Conversion

Dornier 228
Honeywell's TPE331 Turboprop Engine Experience a new way to fly your Dornier 228 with the power and durability that comes from Honeywell's TPE331-10 conversion program. Get a faster, stronger and more versatile option to your existing engine so that you're able to climb quicker and clear the shortest runways around the world. With over 100 Thermodynamic Shaft Horespower (SHP) more than your TPE331-5, you'll notice the value of having a stronger turbine right away.
TPE331-5
TPE331-10
Thermodynamic SHP
840 Min.
1,000 Min.
Flat Rate Torque To

TAE Aviation Working with TAE Aviation is easy and convenient. Upgrade your TPE331 with the TPE331-10 program designed for your Dornier 228 at TAE's Adelaide, Australia maintenance facility.
